>
[Staff-Storing Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1079)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This magically reinforced [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 6, HP 36, BT 18) normally has a blank face. It can absorb a [staff](/equipment/staves) and transform between a shield and staff. When you prepare a staff, you can hold it up to the shield, at which point the items will merge, and the shield's face becomes an image corresponding to the type of magic, such as a skull for a [_staff of necromancy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=360).
